title: Share of aging population Thailand 2015 to 2035
yAxis: Share of population older than 65 years old
summary: This statistic represents the projected Share of population older in the Thailand ( UK ) forecasted from 2015 to 2035 .
According to the figures as of 2015 , it can be seen that the Share of population older was forecasted to increase from approximately 10.6 % in 2015 to a total of 22.8 % by the Year 2035 .
These figures would lead to an average of 16 % older per annum 2035 the years 2015 and 2035 .
